mean_en: If you say that something is far from a particular thing or far from being the case, you are emphasizing that it is not that particular thing or not at all the case, especially when people expect or assume that it is.
sentence: Although they live far from each other, they still love each other very much.
sentence_trans: 虽然远隔千里，但是他们仍然深爱彼此。
